Reviews.Title: Best phone for the price and VERY nice!
Reviews.Author: Shots "Shots"
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box this phone appears to be a well constructed device. After handling it for some time I can say that it rests comfortably in the hand and compared to my previous 4.3" phone, this one is a touch smaller. The screen has beautiful contrast and colors, the camera takes terrific photos. Combine that with a super smooth experience and I really can't complain, especially considering the price point. Yes, it's no quad core monster - but it also doesn't cost as much. Good luck trying to find a better phone under $300 unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, excellent value, but needs more internal memory
Reviews.Author: Brian K
Reviews.Content: I've owned 3-4 smartphones in recent years, including LG and Samsung and use 3,000 minutes or more per month, so I have good take on smartphones for business or personal use.This Sony device is the winner over my prior phones. Here are the reasons.1) The voice quality is excellent. When compared to my last two phones (Samsung and LG), there has never been an issue hearing the other party in any sound environment, either using handset or speakerphone. Every word is clear and easily understood... I can't say this with my other phones (Samsung and LG) as I often had trouble hearing the other party. I believe Sony has created speakers (handset and speakphone) that amplify certain aspects of human speech, which, again, sound quality is excellent on this device. On the other end, no party has ever had trouble hearing me (either using handset or speakerphone- and speakerphone works well hearing me from any distance).2) Excellent battery/energy saving features.  Battery uses less energy and Sony has feature that allows certain apps to shut-down or sleep. Battery life is excellent.3) Fast processor - no problem using any apps, downloads. Functionality is excellent. Device can and will freeze up occasionally, but rebooting is easy and fairly fast, not much time.4) For music fanatics/video usage, the sound quality is excellent. The music player/Walkman on this device is significantly better than my last two smartphones. Sony has a history with the Walkman, and the sound quality on this device is excellent. Video is good as well, although I do not use as much.5) Scratch-resistant glass - glass simply does not scratch, you do not need a screen protector.6) excellent camera - quality is fantastic - 8.0mp... better than the last two devices (LG and Samsung).There are some negatives, notable the internal space tends to fill up at time, making apps unoperable.This device would be 100% the best phone on the market other than issues with internal memory, Sony should add more memory.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: Carlos adrian villasana
Reviews.Content: One of the most faster and powerful smartphones, very slim, big screen even small size, it works IN VENEZUELA WITH MOVISTAR, MOVILNET, if you want to use with DIGITEL 3G you must buy Xperia L c2105

Reviews.Title: awesome phone awesome deal
Reviews.Author: R. Perez "lado oscuro"
Reviews.Content: (UPDATE)2 weeks later... Had to return this phone because only had 5.9gb (1.9gb device mem & 4gb internal mem.)of user storage not 8gb as stated. I really liked this phone but after getting 6 apps it tells you you are almost out of storage. Now I looking for 16gb phone.-----------Got this way before the delivered day by a week, got it new out of the box. So nice to have it didn't think it was going to be so great. Before this one I bought a Nokia 520 but did not like the setup of that phone and plus it only used micro-sim. This phone uses REGULAR SIM with storage expansion.For me its a perfect cell phone, working smoothly, it recognized network immediately so far no problems or malfunction. I have downloaded several apps one after the other got them working without hassle. Call quality is good, the size and resolution of the screen is really awesome, and the speed the tasks are done, and even to switch from one to another no hesitation.I took a star off because the camera is not that great even for a 8-mp as for the sd card I have to remove the battery to insert/remove it, also I can't take a panel at on screen while in lock mode its just empty with a big + on it.I'm currently using H2O wireless but works with AT&T;, T-mobile and Telcel.I did a lot of review reading with this and other phones also watched several video reviews and even a "Xperia Crash Test" video LOLdon't know if this phone is really that strong but it sure is awesome phone awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: a very functional phone
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo Landaeta
Reviews.Content: efficient, fast, sleek, slim, the screen super! is a very functional phone, connected to social networks facebook, instagram, twitter, google, has a unique 8-megapixel camera, radio, walkman, the high-fidelity headphones like all sony equipment, excellent!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Luis A. Sarco B
Reviews.Content: The phone is extraordinary. The screen resolution is wonderfull. Any images look better than in an iphone 4S.It was shipping very fast.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Mon
Reviews.Content: Delivered in time. Absolutely love it. The best phone there is at this price. Doesn't heat up, the battery could last a little longer but it works fine. The shape it has only makes it better and can totally compete with newer, more expensive phones out there.

Reviews.Title: Excelent phone
Reviews.Author: Javier Alexi Pernia Sanchez
Reviews.Content: i'm so happy since i got this phone, almost nothing to complain about it. the camara is perfect. the phone's speed is excelent. the display's colors, even the sound is wonderfull.

Reviews.Title: great  phone
Reviews.Author: Enid Bissember
Reviews.Content: this  phone  is replacing  my  sonny  Erickson  which  I have had  for  a few  years well  . it  is  not  of the same  standard especially  the  camera  but  it does  a  lot  of  things that  I expect  from a  cell  phone and  some more . I am  still  trying to get  used  to some of the features  but  it  is a great  instrument . it  picks  up  internet  connection very easily  and that is  real  good .

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: anitarivas24
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with cellis better than I expectedwas saying in the description that was not new, but seriously if it were not so I would have thought that this new package.It was an excellent Christmas gift.has perfect camera, sound, the screen does not scratch.I like that it is easy to use, and I can connect to my sony tv.with a quick internet cell is like a computer.not give 5 stars because no micro sd was bringing.if I'm happy with the internal memory, has a lot of ability.is easy to use and practical for what I occupy.has front and rear camera and captures images perfect.I love it!

Reviews.Title: beautiful phone, fast, battery last exceptionally long for a smart phone
Reviews.Author: Edin Bojicic
Reviews.Content: have had it for a month now. My old Iphone 3 is a joke compared to this phone. Granted, I am not a heavy user and don't heave too many apps on it, but it hasn't frozen up on me yet, and it is def fast.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: adeboye oriade
Reviews.Content: It is serving the purpose for which I bought it. Any other words said here is a waste of time.

Reviews.Title: Good Phones for the money.
Reviews.Author: Hunter Jones
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone for the money. However, do not buy it if you plan on using it with Verizon, as that is a CDMA network, with which this is not compatible, unfortunately.

Reviews.Title: The best phone I have ever purchased
Reviews.Author: J. E. Page
Reviews.Content: An excellent phone!The phone performs extremely well and seems to be very reliable. the features and support are also excellent.

Reviews.Title: Best phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: Beau
Reviews.Content: This phone is used in the USA on T-Mobiles family mobile and works great. It has NFC and hot-spot and capabilities. You will not find another phone with the options this one has anywhere near this price range. Don't get me wrong this phone could be a little faster and have more storage but other than that is a great phone. Feel free to ask question and I will answer them the best i can.

Reviews.Title: not bad pretty good
Reviews.Author: HugoCai
Reviews.Content: I think it is pretty good in this price.  And I hope it can be used for one year. Thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent phone I liked a lot indisputably
Reviews.Author: ruben perez
Reviews.Content: I think a great phone with great features I really liked and I recommend this sony unquestionably positioned thanks to the quality of the equipment that remain in the market I think customers are satisfied with their products

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Ivan P.
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, it's fast and it feels really nice on hand, I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: ana guerra
Reviews.Content: excellent quality product, a very good option for all those interested in the products of its class, Good Holiday reinteradas times for those interested.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Love this cell phone. Has all the qualities of the pricey contract phones but very affordable for someone on a limited budget.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, affordable price
Reviews.Author: revlis
Reviews.Content: For me simple is better. This phone was easy to navigate, I love the sleek look and like that it feets in the palm of my hand.

Reviews.Title: solid phone
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: Came on time, everything came with it that's was supposed to and works smoothly haven't had any problems, I luv it

Reviews.Title: Great Inexpensive Android
Reviews.Author: John M. Phillips "HW guy"
Reviews.Content: A little slow sometimes and a few bluetooth issues, but otherwise flawless. The Bluetooth issues hopefully will be fixed with firmware updates that I have not installed.

Reviews.Title: Mobile Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Fergus
Reviews.Content: Mobile Excellent! Sony is definitely the best brand .. is fast, convenient to carry by hand, it takes good pictures, good memory, I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Nice, good performance
Reviews.Author: jnovoa
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, good performance, good resolution, enoughmemory... I like it.The reason I don't give 5 stars is the lack of physical buttons. Back, home, and apps buttons are inside the screen, so they reduce the usable screen area.

Reviews.Title: Mehanicle and software problems
Reviews.Author: Arie Eckhaus
Reviews.Content: i have few froblems wuth the phone: the botton on the side doesn't work well and google chrome doesn't work at all.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Santiago V.
Reviews.Content: I liked the looks and general performance, easy to download applications and fast processor.I have had problems when connected to the car via bluetooth, sometimes the phone doesn't respond to the buttons on the wheel. It never happened with my previous phone (Sony Ericsson Vivaz).I'd recommend it for excellent price - product relation.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Tadeo Galeano
Reviews.Content: Perfect Cellphone, absolutely beautiful and working 100% smoothly. He recognized network it immediately and was able to use it when out of the box.So far I not find problems or malfunction and I am pleased with the purchase made​​, the cellphone works perfectly outside the USA, I'm currently using in Paraguay with the local mobile telephony.El celular perfecto, absolutamente hermoso y funcionando al 100% sin problemas. Reconoció la red inmediatamente y se pudo usar el mismo al momento de sacarlo de la caja.Hasta el momento no encuentro problemas o mal funcionamiento en él y me siento contento con la compra hecha, el celular funciona perfectamente fuera de USA, yo actualmente lo estoy usando en Paraguay con la telefonía móvil local.

Reviews.Title: never thought it would be so good
Reviews.Author: Jahziel
Reviews.Content: My first smartphone was a Xperia U, it was ok, had some features i liked more than my friend's phones, but was too clumsy, slow and sometimes unreliable.Decided to give Sony Xperia another chance, and went with a good deal I found on Amazon. It has been two weeks since i got my Xperia L and everyday i feel more satisfied with the purchase, definitely is a very good phone, outstanding unit for the price. Call quality is good, the size and resolution of the screen are really something, and the speed the tasks are done, and even to switch from one to another left me surprised, definitely it has been more than i expected.

Reviews.Title: It's just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo
Reviews.Content: It's a great autonomy phone suits my needs is music and navigation, for a mid-range phone is the best I've seen in the market at this price.

Reviews.Title: Avoid this phone like the Plague!
Reviews.Author: S. Powers
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Sony Xperia, and I've been very happy with them.  I was happy with this one too, until last month when the Android 4.2 upgrade came out.  Now the thing is just awful.  Every time I take it out of my pocket it has a 25% chance of rebooting as soon as I touch anything.  It is just awful.  The Xperia messaging boards are aflame with people having problems with this upgrade.  I can't even sufficiently use my phone to find all the other problems people are complaining about.  Just shocking that any company would release an "upgrade" that totally hoses most users in exchange for minor cosmetic upgrades to the OS.  If you buy this, definitely never upgrade it.  I'm miserable with this product now.

Reviews.Title: quite nice
Reviews.Author: luisa
Reviews.Content: its quite nice but I dont know why the google navigator doesnt let me read an article, it always closes by itself, if anyone know why and what I can do about it Id be greatful to know. (aladita@hotmail.com) facebook, youtube and whatsapp work fine though.The camera has really good reviews Im a little disapointed, with the flash it over exposed and without its really slow so it ends up blurry...

Reviews.Title: Bad Phone
Reviews.Author: Drob
Reviews.Content: Phone build quality is great. Camera is lousy. Signal reception is poor as well. I do not recommend phone. Not worth the price.This is my experience only.

Reviews.Title: Sony is a crap
Reviews.Author: hazem
Reviews.Content: Sony  is a Crap,I lost all my money on this crap,too much money just to get the worst service ever.Sony is not responsible, and they don't support their products.

Reviews.Title: It heats up and is pretty ugly inside
Reviews.Author: Pawan Garg
Reviews.Content: The device heats up a lot when used continuously. The battery drain is quick. I also did not like the design on the inside of the back cover.
